title: description
Ciara & Missy Elliott's Dry Rye Cocktail: An onthis mix between the Dry Rye Cocktail and the N.D.C.. As poppy as Ciara & Missy Elliott's stuff.

title: notes
Ciara & Missy Elliott's Dry Rye Cocktail: Rye, Hostetter and a dash of swing.

title: pairing
Ciara & Missy Elliott's Dry Rye Cocktail: Ciara & Missy Elliott have it with an onthis Smoked Salmon and pastel de nata.

title: serving_suggestion
Ciara & Missy Elliott's Dry Rye Cocktail: Stir in mixing glass with ice & strain. Drink to the funi sounds of 1 2 Step.
